description: As the town doctor, Hijiri has taken care of her younger sister, Kano, ever since their parents died. Believing Kano`s curse to be some sort of disease, Hijiri trained as a doctor in order to try and cure her. Hijiri was the one who originally tied the ribbon around Kano`s wrist after seeing her younger sister attempt to commit suicide. She is also Yukito`s employer, who works at her clinic doing odd jobs.
name: Kirishima Hijiri
